did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Speeches, reports, printed materials, newsletters, and manuscripts.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Speeches, reports, pamphlets, newsletters, flyers, and unpublished items written or distributed by left wing organizations.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Speeches, reports, pamphlets, newsletters, flyers, and unpublished items written or distributed by left wing organizations. Includes pamphlets by Upton Sinclair and Sumner H. Slichter; newsletters of the League for Independent Political Action; flyers of the Socialist Party; and material concerning women's political issues.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Left Wing Organizations. Printed Items, #3448. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

unittitle.extref: Link to a partial finding aid.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
